 Creativity for All:  Elevating Diverse Voices 
Adobe is investing in diverse creators and promoting systems and policies that give everyone the opportunity to create, 
make their voices heard and share their stories. 
Diverse Voices 
Adobe's Diverse Voices  program was built to provide underrepresented creators 
with tangible and scalable opportunities to grow their careers by ofering Adobe 
platforms to amplify their work and stories as well as mentorship with industry leaders inside and outside Adobe. Te Diverse Voices platform on Adobe.com showcases stories of diverse creators from a spectrum of disciplines. Examples of our initiatives to make creativity more equitable include:

Partnerships 
Our work with partners such as Sundance,  
Apple+, Meta, USC Annenberg and others  
aims to provide underrepresented creators  
with the mentorship and access they need  
to advance their careers. In 2022, the  
partnerships resulted in 75 new intensive  
mentorships and over 10 million  
impressions for their work.
